description: Strategic Sourcing and Management of Promotional Items
full_summary:
**Strategic Sourcing and Management of Promotional Items**
=================================================


### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01023033
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: DC-2023-JW-01
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-23 17:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-13

### Notice Details

* **Solicitation Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Destination Canada
* **Procurement Contact**: Jennie Wong, procurement@destinationcanada.com

### Tender Description

Destination Canada is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply of promotional products. The successful supplier will require expertise in sourcing, designing, managing production, and shipping logistics for branded and unbranded promotional items. Additionally, Destination Canada may also require warehousing and inventory services from time to time.

### Documentation

The tender package can be accessed at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/d583b9d5409d47a10b104a4000675b21/rfsq_dc-2023-jw-01_strategic_sourcing_and_management_of_promotional_items.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/d583b9d5409d47a10b104a4000675b21/rfsq_dc-2023-jw-01_strategic_sourcing_and_management_of_promotional_items.pdf) 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/13/efb03f2b3fe852b2cfb8d7ace9a21ddf/2023_dc-2023-jw-01_addendum_1_final_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/13/efb03f2b3fe852b2cfb8d7ace9a21ddf
